segments.text: Is it all right for me to come in now . Mr . Sutcliffe ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ... I'm pretty busy . but ... all right . come in . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I sit down ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . Take a seat . Now , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to leave the department . Do you think I could put in for a transfer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but why should you want to do that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you mind if I speak frankly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you see . I don't like the office . I don't like the staff.and I'm afraid you and I don't get on . So may I put in for a transfer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd delighted if you did .
segments.speaker: S2
